original: cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo dang / sems can la rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad la dad de blta bar bya ba thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo dang / sems can la rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad la dad de blta bar bya ba thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang /
translated: He has faith in the phenomena of sentient beings, emptiness, and the characteristic of signlessness. He does not let any view lie dormant.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la dad cing thos nas the tshom med nem nur med par chos de rnams sdud par byed pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la dad cing thos nas the tshom med nem nur med par chos de rnams sdud par byed pa de ni /
translated: It is the faculty of faith that, having heard about all the qualities of the Buddha, his powers and his fearlessnesses, is free of doubt and uncertainty and is dedicated to gathering those qualities.

original: dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the faculty of faith.

original: de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the faculty of diligence?

original: chos gang la dad pa de brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos gang la dad pa de brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the faculty of diligence that gives rise to the faith in those qualities.

original: de ni / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the faculty of diligence.

original: chos gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdus pa de dag dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa de ni /
analyzed: chos gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdus pa de dag dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa de ni /
translated: Those qualities that are gathered by the faculty of diligence are not lost by the faculty of mindfulness.

original: dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the faculty of mindfulness.

original: chos gang dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa'i chos de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de ni /
analyzed: chos gang dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa'i chos de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de ni /
translated: Those qualities that are not lost by the faculty of mindfulness are unified by the faculty of concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the faculty of concentration.

original: chos gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig par byed pa de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rtog par byed de /
analyzed: chos gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig par byed pa de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rtog par byed de /
translated: Whatever phenomena are unified by the faculty of meditative absorption are discerned by the faculty of wisdom.

original: gang chos de dag shes pa de ni /
analyzed: gang chos de dag shes pa de ni /
translated: That which knows those phenomena

original: shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the faculty of wisdom.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: dbang po lnga po de dag lhan cig tu 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po lnga po de dag lhan cig tu 'brel ba ste /
translated: those five faculties are mutually connected.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: They bring the qualities of buddhahood to perfection

original: lung bstan pa'i sa yang thob par byed de /
analyzed: lung bstan pa'i sa yang thob par byed de /
translated: and cause the attainment of the stage of prophecy.

original: 'di @349b lta ste /
analyzed: 'di @349b lta ste /
translated: For example,🔽just as the five external superknowledges do not prophesy about someone in the womb until the female or male faculties have developed,

original: dper na / phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag mngal na 'dug pa bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang por ma gyur gyi bar du mngal na 'dug pa la lung mi ston pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
analyzed: dper na / phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag mngal na 'dug pa bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang por ma gyur gyi bar du mngal na 'dug pa la lung mi ston pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
translated: in the same way, the blessed buddhas do not prophesy about bodhisattvas

original: dbang po lnga po de dag dang mi ldan gyi bar du lung mi ston te /
analyzed: dbang po lnga po de dag dang mi ldan gyi bar du lung mi ston te /
translated: until they have those five faculties.

original: de ni / lam yan lag lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de ni / lam yan lag lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fivefold path.

original: de ltar na; byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: de ltar na; byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: Thus, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva who is skilled in the fivefold path practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan yang sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: gzhan yang sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga la mkhas pa gang zhe na /🔽yan lag lnga ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga la mkhas pa gang zhe na / yan lag lnga ni /
translated: what is the bodhisattva’s skill in the fivefold path?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The five limbs are as follows:🔽namely,

original: dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so //
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so //
translated: the power of faith, the power of perseverance, the power of mindfulness, the power of concentration, and the power of wisdom.

original: de la dad pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dad pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the power of faith?

original: gang mos pa dad pa mgo gcig pa mi rdzi ba ste /
analyzed: gang mos pa dad pa mgo gcig pa mi rdzi ba ste /
translated: It is the single-pointed faith and conviction that cannot be crushed.

original: gal te de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgyur te 'ongs nas chos kyi ye shes la dad pa gang yang rung ba la la zhig gis chos 'di dag ni /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgyur te 'ongs nas chos kyi ye shes la dad pa gang yang rung ba la la zhig gis chos 'di dag ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no //
translated: If Māra the wicked one were to come before you in the form of the Buddha, he might try to destroy your faith in the wisdom of the Dharma. He might say,🔽‘These are not the teachings of the Buddha.

original: zhes dbral bar byed /
analyzed: zhes dbral bar byed /
translated: Thus, you should separate yourself from them.🔽🔽

original: 'dun pa zlog par byed kyang yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
analyzed: 'dun pa zlog par byed kyang yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
translated: if he were to take up a thorough investigation,

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni /
translated: the four great elements

original: gzhan du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur gyi /
translated: would change,

original: dad pa'i stobs la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: but the bodhisattva who is intent on the power of faith

original: de lta ma yin no //🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stobs @350a *//
analyzed: de lta ma yin no // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stobs @350a *//
translated: would not.

original: las 'bral bar mi nus pa de ni /
analyzed: las 'bral bar mi nus pa de ni /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva who cannot be separated from the power🔽of faith

original: dad pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs so //
translated: is one who has the power of faith.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattva’s power of perseverance?

original: gang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mngon par sbyor ba de dang de dag la brtan pa'i stobs kyi mthu thob kyang gnas der ma bsgral gyi bar du stobs kyi mthu de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyis rnam par bzlog🔽pa'am / bstan pa'am /
analyzed: gang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mngon par sbyor ba de dang de dag la brtan pa'i stobs kyi mthu thob kyang gnas der ma bsgral gyi bar du stobs kyi mthu de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyis rnam par bzlog pa'am / bstan pa'am /
translated: Whatever wholesome states he applies himself to, he attains the power of stability in them and the ability to persevere in them. Until he has crossed over to the other shore of that state, the power of that ability cannot be overcome by the world with its gods, humans, and asuras,🔽nor can it be turned back,

original: rnam par bslang bar mi nus te /
analyzed: rnam par bslang bar mi nus te /
translated: nor can it be shaken.

original: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattva’s power of perseverance.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ power of mindfulness consist in?

original: chos gang dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pas sems nye bar bzhag pa ste /
analyzed: chos gang dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pas sems nye bar bzhag pa ste /
translated: It is the mind that is settled in the application of mindfulness to any given phenomenon.

original: de ni / nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag gis gtong ba'am g-yeng bar mi nus te /
analyzed: de ni / nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag gis gtong ba'am g-yeng bar mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible for any of the afflictions to let go of or distract it.

original: dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms shing dran pa de yang mi chom pa ste /
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms shing dran pa de yang mi chom pa ste /
translated: Through the power of mindfulness, all afflictions are overcome, and that mindfulness itself is not destroyed.

original: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the bodhisattvas’ power of mindfulness.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ power of absorption consist in?

original: gang 'du 'dzi thams cad dben par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'du 'dzi thams cad dben par spyod pa ste /
translated: It is to be free from all distractions.

original: gang dag gi lam gyi sgra thams cad la yang rtog la de'i bsam gtan dang po'i sgra'i tsher ma la sgrib par mi byed pa dang / dge bar rtog pa la yang rnam par rtog mod kyi /
analyzed: gang dag gi lam gyi sgra thams cad la yang rtog la de'i bsam gtan dang po'i sgra'i tsher ma la sgrib par mi byed pa dang / dge bar rtog pa la yang rnam par rtog mod kyi /
translated: It is to be aware of all the sounds of the path, yet not to be obstructed by the thorns of the sounds of the first dhyāna.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang sgrib par @350b mi 'byung ba dang / de dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gnas mod kyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang sgrib par @350b mi 'byung ba dang / de dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gnas mod kyi /
translated: He does not become obscured with regard to the second concentration, and he abides in the joy and bliss that have arisen.

original: de'i bsam gtan gsum pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms pa yang ma yin mod kyi /🔽bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de'i bsam gtan gsum pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms pa yang ma yin mod kyi / bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: He does not become obscured with regard to the third concentration, and he does not become indifferent to bringing about the full spiritual ripening of sentient beings and upholding the sublime Dharma.

original: de bsam gtan de bzhi la gnas na /
analyzed: de bsam gtan de bzhi la gnas na /
translated: He does not become obscured with regard to the fourth concentration, and he abides in that fourth concentration.

original: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pas gzhom par mi nus te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pas gzhom par mi nus te /
translated: He is not overcome by the concentrations and liberations.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi gtong la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi gtong la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste /
translated: He does not abandon the states of meditative absorption, yet he is not reborn due to the power of meditative absorption.

original: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
analyzed: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ power of meditative absorption.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ power of insight consist in?

original: gang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis mi tshom pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: gang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis mi tshom pa'i ye shes te /
translated: It is the knowledge that is not doubted by any mundane or supramundane phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyes ma thag tu bzo'i gnas 'jig rten na ji snyed spyod pa dam pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rnyed dka' ba de dag thams cad slob dpon med par mngon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyes ma thag tu bzo'i gnas 'jig rten na ji snyed spyod pa dam pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rnyed dka' ba de dag thams cad slob dpon med par mngon du 'gyur te /
translated: As soon as the bodhisattva is born, he or she spontaneously manifests all the mundane arts and crafts, whatever there may be in the world, that are sublime, delightful, and difficult to acquire.

original: gang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang gang gis 'jig rten dag sgrol bar byed de /
analyzed: gang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang gang gis 'jig rten dag sgrol bar byed de /
translated: And he or she also manifests those that are supramundane, by which he or she liberates the world.

original: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byung ba /
analyzed: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byung ba /
translated: These are the results of the bodhisattva’s wisdom and knowledge.

original: lha dang / mi rnams kyis mi chom pa ste /
analyzed: lha dang / mi rnams kyis mi chom pa ste /
translated: They are not surpassed by any gods or humans.

original: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so //
analyzed: de ni / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so //
translated: This is the bodhisattva’s power of wisdom.

original: 'di ni / yan lag lnga pa'i lam gzhan no //
analyzed: 'di ni / yan lag lnga pa'i lam gzhan no //
translated: This is another path of the five limbs.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: @351a *// byang chub sems dpa' yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: @351a *// byang chub sems dpa' yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: the bodhisattva who is skilled in the five limbs practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan yang mdor bsdu na /
analyzed: gzhan yang mdor bsdu na /
translated: Moreover, in brief,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni /
translated: The path of the bodhisattvas

original: mgo gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mgo gcig pa ste /
translated: is singular.

original: de ni / lam bgrod pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de ni / lam bgrod pa gcig pa'o //
translated: It is the single path to be traversed.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grogs med par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas go cha bgos pa ste /🔽gzhan gyis ma bstan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grogs med par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas go cha bgos pa ste / gzhan gyis ma bstan pa /
translated: The bodhisattva, alone and without a companion, dons the armor of the resolve to take up the power of the strength of effort for the sake of perfect awakening.🔽He does not rely on others.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa /
translated: He is not led by others.

original: bdag nyid byed pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid byed pa /
translated: He acts on his own.

original: bdag gi stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gi stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste /
translated: He is exalted by his own power.

original: de ltar go cha sra ba bgos nas gang sems can thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar go cha sra ba bgos nas gang sems can thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o //
translated: Having donned such solid armor, he thinks, “Whatever has not been attained by any sentient being, I will attain that.

original: gang 'phags pa thams cad dang / gang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa thams cad dang / gang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o //
translated: Whatever has not been attained by any noble one, or by any bodhisattva who has newly entered the vehicle, I will attain that.

original: sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa ni /
translated: Generosity

original: nga'i grogs ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nga'i grogs ma yin gyi /
translated: is not my companion.

original: nga ni / sbyin pa'i grogs so //
analyzed: nga ni / sbyin pa'i grogs so //
translated: I am the friend of generosity.

original: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ni /
translated: Morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom

original: nga'i grogs ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nga'i grogs ma yin gyi /
translated: are not my friends.
